text: فَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل رَّبُّكُمۡ ذُو رَحۡمَةٖ وَٰسِعَةٖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

translation.en: So if they deny you, [O Muhammad], say, "Your Lord is the possessor of vast mercy; but His punishment cannot be repelled from the people who are criminals
translation.id: Maka jika mereka mendustakan kamu, katakanlah, "Tuhanmu mempunyai rahmat yang luas, dan siksa-Nya kepada orang-orang yang berdosa tidak dapat dielakkan
